text: Christa diang ning i-om ringkhuo khan nangnidiang ranak ngarna anamin eii khat-um ama minriang nakhan anaminhoi, nangni'n Ratha ah ning inchunsuom,2:1: nangni'n ratha ah ning inchunsuom; emakli ratha khan khatli khat inchuntheina sik-ah inaheiruoi ejei. halli nangni'n khatle khatsik-ah minriang li malungtai nakha ningnei.
